title: geth crashes when severeal Whisper/SHH filters are created
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `Geth/v1.4.9-stable-b7e3dfc5/darwin/go1.6.2`
OS & Version: OSX
Commit hash : (if `develop`)
#### Expected behaviour

No crash
#### Actual behaviour

Sporadic crash if several filters are created
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

I create several filters, if these created very fast geth is crashing with the following stack trace. If I only create one then everything is fine.
#### Backtrace

Using a RWMutex to synchronize writes to this map fixes the issue.
Same goes for the map of watchers in the Filter class, which was causing the issue for @macrauder.

I created pull request #3019 for this.
